import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Button } from '../../Common/Static' import { editInvite } from '../../../Data/Database' export default function RsvpIndividual(props) { const [editForm, setEditForm] = useState(false) const [newName, setNewName] = useState('') function handleChange(event) { setNewName(event.target.value) } return ( <>
{editForm ? ( <>

{props.selected.email === '' ? 'NA' : props.selected.email}

{props.selected.response}

) }
